Although fever is a common reaction to bacterial infections, many people with MyD88 deficiency do not at first develop a high fever in response to these infections, even if the infection is severe.",GHR,MyD88 deficiency
How many people are affected by MyD88 deficiency ?,The prevalence of MyD88 deficiency is unknown. At least 24 affected individuals have been described in the medical literature.,GHR,MyD88 deficiency
